description: Ermengarde is a fellow Reasoner in Basion, and a member of the Space Squadron. Her friends call her "Ermy". She is quite obsessed with her weight, although there does not appear to be any reason for her to be so. However, as much as she restricts herself to health food and exercise, she cannot resist a good dessert. Ermengarde and Martha are always seen together.
name: Ermengarde Johannitz
